experience: You and Gabriel D. both know Andy Palmer, Brent Cappello, and 93 others
In the late 1990s something interesting has happened.
Back then, Apple was worth about $100 million, so Michael Dell, founder and CEO of Dell, one of the leading technology companies of those days, said something as follows:
"Apple should shut its doors and stop the embarrassment of being in business".
More than 20 years have passed, Apple is steadily approaching $1 trillion market cap, and nobody talks about Michael Dell anymore.
I'm not saying this is related 1-to-1, but think of this for a sec:
On September 2017, Jamie Dimon, CEO of JPMorgan Chase & Co., one of the biggest #banks in the world, says that #Bitcoin is a 'fraud', and it's even worse than the 'tulip mania'.
About 2 months have passed, the price of #BTC has nearly doubled, it's steadily approaching $10,000, and no one talks about Jamie Dimon anymore.
And this is not precisely about #Bitcoin, or #cryptocurrencies in general. This is about not being able to properly evaluate something new.
This is about failing to see potential in the 'new' due to the fact of being heavily attached to the 'old'.
Magnus Lind, Anders Liu-Lindberg, John Patrick Mullin, Mikko Alasaarela, Samson Williams, Kyle Wang, Bruce Bates, Mike Richardson (迈克尔), Sean Goodwin, your thoughts on this?

summary: I am a hungry innovator at my core. In everywhere I participate, I seeks to add value to industries, businesses, and people in a conscientious way that keeps company vision at the forefront of every action and plan.From the experience I have gained in building two of his own businesses, I understand the role of wearing many hats. I have constantly worked in under-capitalized, tight timeline, and heavy pressure situations to drive results. I have a keen understanding of utilizing social media presence and key influencer attention that have grown my ability to recognize the importance of original media content that guides my marketing strategies, and the way I position a brand to interacts with trends, users, and clients to create a holistic and impact. I greatly enjoy industries on the bleeding-edge of technology from marketing and advertising, to blockchain, machine learning and artificial intelligence.
